text: Andrea Kimi Antonelli (Italian pronunciation: [anˈdrɛ.a ˈki.mi an.toˈnɛl.li]; born 25 August 2006 in Bologna) is an Italian racing driver, currently competing in the FIA Formula 1 Championship for Prema Racing. He is the son of racing driver Marco Antonelli. Category:2006 births Category:Living people Category:Italian racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Bologna
title: Andrea Kimi Antonelli
